snippet.title: Slay The Princess - The Pristine Cut Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on PlayStation today, and follow us for updates on Xbox and Nintendo Switch: https://serenityforge.com/games/slay-the-princess

You're on a path in the woods, and at the end of that path is a cabin. And in the basement of that cabin is a Princess. 

You're here to slay her. But something is different.

Slay the Princess is a choice-driven psychological horror visual novel/dating sim with dramatic branching, full voice acting by Jonathan Sims & Nichole Goodnight, light RPG elements, and lovingly hand-penciled art by Abby Howard.
 
The Pristine Cut is the definitive version of this beloved title, and this fall it's coming to consoles for the first time.  

The Pristine Cut adds 3 brand new chapters, expansions to The Den, The Apotheosis, and The Fury, a new ending, and accounts for 35% more content overall from the original PC release. 

Wishlist on PlayStation today, and join our mailing list for more news on the Nintendo Switch and Xbox releases.

Black Tabby Games:
Website: https://blacktabbygames.com/
X: https://x.com/blacktabbygames
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/black_tabby_games/
Discord: https://www.discord.gg/blacktabbygames

Serenity Forge:
Website: https://serenityforge.com
Store Page: https://store.serenityforge.com/
X: https://x.com/SerenityForge
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SerenityForge
Discord: https://www.discord.gg/serenityforge
